text:
League 1
OM-Lille streaming: where to see the match?
Olympique de Marseille hosts Lille on behalf of the 12th day of Ligue 1. A poster broadcast live on French television this Saturday, November 2, 2019 from 17:30 on Canal +, but also to follow live streaming on PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad or Android.
02 Nov 2019, 06:50 by Florian Sermaise



Lille: the 5 record transfers of this summerDauphin of the PSG during the last exercise after a magnificent season, the LOSC had prepared to lose a good part of its elements this summer. Transfers that could bring nearly ‚Ç¨ 160 million to the club, while the total value of the workforce is estimated at ‚Ç¨ 200 million. In addition, three of these sales are among the top five sales in the history of the club!



5. Anwar El-Ghazi - 24 years old From Lille to Aston Villa for 9 M ‚Ç¨ .Icon Sport



4. Youssouf Kon√© - 24 years old From Lille to Lyon for 9 M ‚Ç¨ .Icon Sport



3. Thiago Mendes - 27 years old From Lille to Lyon for 22 M ‚Ç¨ .Icon Sport



2. Rafael Le√£o - 20 years old From Lille to AC Milan for 35 M ‚Ç¨ .Icon Sport



1. Nicolas P√©p√© - 24 years old From Lille to Arsenal for 80 M ‚Ç¨ .Icon Sport

Lille: 5 record transfers this summer




Olympique de Marseille continues its infernal schedule. After Paris Saint-Germain a week ago, after AS Monaco a few days ago in the Coupe de la Ligue, and before Olympique Lyonnais in seven days, the Phoenicians have an appointment at the Stade V√©lodrome with Lille. A tour of the cadors of the championship that started badly at the Parc des Princes, the men of Andr√© Villas-Boas being swept by Kylian Mbapp√© and his family (0-4). The out-of-category PSG, OM has especially the opportunity against the Northerners to stick to the pursuers. Large winner of Bordeaux during the previous day (3-0), LOSC, third, actually only two points ahead of his host, currently seventh in Ligue 1. This 12th episode of the 2019/2020 season could prove to be a turning point for both teams, as regards one of the shocks of the French championship.








OM-Lille streaming




Bouna Sarr + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This poster of the 12th day of Ligue 1 between Marseille and Lille is broadcast live on television on Canal + this Saturday, November 2, from 17:30. But you can also watch this match live streaming video:

Either via the subscription service (so paying) beIN Sports Connect available on PC & Mac via an Internet browser (Firefox, Chrome, Safari, etc.) but also on iPhone, iPad, Android, Xbox One, PS4, Chromecast or Apple TV.
Either from iOS and Android applications and from your TV provider (ISP or pay per view like Canal +): Orange TV, SFR TV, MyCanal ...
